scripts.build: npm run build-components && npm run build-schema
scripts.build-components: cd examples && cd ex-kitchen-sink && tar -cvjSf ../ex-kitchen-sink.tar.bz2 * && cd ../ex-web-component && tar -cvjSf ../ex-web-component.tar.bz2 * && cd ../ex-comparison-table && tar -cvjSf ../ex-comparison-table.tar.bz2 * && cd ../ex-faqs && tar -cvjSf ../ex-faqs.tar.bz2 * && cd ../mmx-example && tar -cvjSf ../mmx-example.tar.bz2 * && cd ../ex-kitchen-sink && tar -cvjSf ../ex-kitchen-sink.tar.bz2 * && cd ../ex-basic && tar -cvjSf ../ex-basic.tar.bz2 * && cd ../dup-featured-product && tar -cvjSf ../dup-featured-product.tar.bz2 *
